title: Dr. Laura Jones - Whole Health Concord
description: Dr. Laura Jones earned a Doctorate in Naturopathic Medicine with Honors from Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine and a Bachelor of Science in Biochemistry with Honors from the University of New Hampshire.
cleaned_text: Dr. Laura Jones earned a Doctorate in Naturopathic Medicine with Honors from Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine and a Bachelor of Science in Biochemistry with Honors from the University of New Hampshire. Dr. Laura Jones is a licensed primary care naturopathic doctor. She treats patients of all ages with a variety of health concerns. Areas of greatest interest are: - Women's health - Weight loss - Endocrine and Metabolic disorders including Diabetes and Thyroid disease - Gastrointestinal disorders - Autoimmune disease Dr. Jones also specializes in the treatment of menopause symptoms and the use of phytoestrogens and Bio-Identical Hormone Replacement Therapy. She employs several naturopathic modalities when treating patients with a focus on Clinical Nutrition including vitamin and mineral supplementation, Homeopathy and Herbal Medicine. She works with each patient to uncover the cause of their illness and develop a treatment plan using the Naturopathic modalities that best suit their individual needs. Dr. Jones is a certified practitioner of First Line Therapy, a lifestyle medicine program run within Whole Health for patients with high risk for Cardiometabolic disease. During her training, Dr. Jones was a member of the Diabetes Research Group which focused on treatments for patients with type II diabetes, obesity and cholesterol concerns. Dr. Jones lectures throughout New Hampshire on various topics related to health. She is a member of the New Hampshire Association of Naturopathic Doctors. In addition, she is a Wellness Educator for the Concord Cooperative Market and sits on the New Hampshire Board of Naturopathic Examiners.
